name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Paul L. HAMMER, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Hammer

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Paul L. HAMMER, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 15th day of July, 1999, upon consideration of the Remand Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated May 10, 1999, Respondent’s Objections and response thereto, it is hereby
ORDERED that Paul L. Hammer be subjected to public censure by the Supreme Court. It is further ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
735 A.2d 72
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Paul L. HAMMER, Respondent.
No. 376 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 15, 1999.
